description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Eggplant Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chips & fries,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spiced Eggplant Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line 3 baking trays with paper towels. Slice eggplant very thinly into rounds. Lay on the paper towel. Sprinkle each with a little salt to draw out moisture. Set aside for 15 minutes.
Combine spices in a small bowl. Pat eggplant dry with extra paper towel and stack onto one of the trays.

Heat oil into a wok over medium-high heat. Fry eggplant in batches for 3 minutes, turning over until golden. Using a slotted spoon transfer to paper towel lined trays to drain. Sprinkle with spice mix. Serve immediately.
